page.title: 15Arts & Crafts
page.content: The area is provided with an art and craft centre in the old rural school of Forgan. This centre is open to all sectors of the public and they can learn a wide variety of arts and crafts, some of which are pottery, drawing and painting, sculptures, embroidery and tapestry work and basketry. The centre also holds regular exhibitions of people's work. Once a year in the West hall there is an exhibition of arts and crafts and they also sell things like paintings by the local people and jewellery.
